name: Free Play Killer Queen League (Season XIII) #FPKQLXIII
description: Hivemind Tournament page used for recording and helping organize all official matches of the Free Play Killer Queen League for Season XIII.
registration_message: Register for free and join your teams (I can transfer you over as well)

name: Tuesday Taps 80
description: The DraftMixer tradition can never die in Dallas with Tuesday Taps at Free Play Dallas! Signups and casuals are free until 8pm, new players 100% welcome. Then teams are drafted (or computer mixed for skill) and we compete in a double elimination bracket (8pm) streamed live at Twitch.tv/fpkql. Each member of the winning team gets 8,000 rewards points in the Free Play Loyalty Club https://freeplayinc.com/club , a Polaroid with the team, and the adulation of all Killer Queen players in attendance.

name: Thunderdome Thursday
description:
An all skill level inclusive event for any fan of Killer Queen, or people who are new to the game.
We'll be forming teams on location starting between 7:30-8 PM (Get here early if you can!).
If you will be here at or after 8 PM, please let Chris know so we can get your name on the roster beforehand. This helps us start to form teams so we're not starting the tournament too late.
This is a monthly Killer Queen Tournament that takes place every fourth Thursday.
Just a reminder we are 21 & up after 9 PM, but if your team is still playing, younger teammates are allowed to stay.
Have any questions? Message Free Play Denton or Chris Delp.
Bonus ~ it's 40% off all drafts.
Can't wait to tap with everyone!
registration_message: Register for free, just click through any payment options.  This will track your tournament stats as well as let you dictate exactly how you are called to the cab by the overlay.

Then teams are drafted (or computer mixed for skill) and we compete in a double elimination bracket (8pm) streamed live at Twitch.tv/fpkql. Each member of the winning team gets 8,000 rewards points in the Free Play Loyalty Club https://freeplayinc.com/club , a Polaroid with the team, and the adulation of all Killer Queen players in attendance.
registration_message:
Register for free, just click through any payment options.  This will track your tournament stats as well as let you dictate exactly how you are called to the cab by the overlay.

Please list "Free Agent" as your team.

name: Second Saturday Swarm
description:
With leagues, traveling squads, clubs, families, rock bands, office groups, and virtually everyone in between having teams of Killer Queen players looking for opportunities to show their stuff and find avenues to improve, the Apiarists of the Free Play Killer Queen League present a free monthly event where you can bring your own team of friends to compete!
Preregister for free by adding your team here, and we will see you the Second Saturday of the month at 2pm! - https://docs.google.com/.../1qk9t.../edit...
The location will alternate between Free Play Arlington and Free Play Dallas and streamed live on Twitch at twitch.tv/fpkql
registration_message: Register for free, ignore anything payment related

name: Dallas Derby Devils Takeover Killer Queen
description:
Our Free Play Arlington tradition is restored! The Dallas Derby Devils are taking over Killer Queen and we are running a mixed event. That means you'll get to play side by side, teammates with your favorite derby skaters (and yes some of them will be on skates.) The winners hoist the Honey Pot trophy.
The DDD will be there taking over the Twitch stream, with merch from your favorite team colors, and more. It's a unique experience you won't find anywhere else.

name: Thunderdome Thursday
description:
An all skill level inclusive event for any fan of Killer Queen, or people who are new to the game.
We'll be forming teams on location starting between 7:30-8 PM (Get here early if you can!).
If you will be here at or after 8 PM, please let Chris know so we can get your name on the roster beforehand. This helps us start to form teams so we're not starting the tournament too late.
This is a monthly Killer Queen Tournament that takes place every fourth Thursday.
Just a reminder we are 21 & up after 9 PM, but if your team is still playing, younger teammates are allowed to stay.
Have any questions? Message Free Play Denton or Chris Delp.
Bonus ~ it's 40% off all drafts.
Can't wait to tap with everyone!

name: Assassination City Roller Derby Takeover
description:
We continue a joint event series with Assassination City Roller Derby with a special presentation this Friday. The Roller Derby squads are coming in, skates and all, to play on mixed teams of the 10 player arcade hit, Killer Queen with us. With 2 machines and Killer Queen players from all over the Metroplex, it will be a unique mixing of scenes!.
This event is new player friendly, and thus free to enter for all in the building that wish to dip their toes into Killer Queen, and play with the stars of Roller Derby. It'll all be streamed live a Twitch.tv/fpkql

name: Dallas Derby Devils Takeover Killer Queen
Skyline Swarm
description:
Free Play's annual Summer Farewell Killer Queen Weekend is back, with a new location and a new name.
The full weekend of adventures include:
◘ Friday - Free Play Dallas mixer, special event themed cocktails, and two Killer Queen Cabs, each streaming casuals live, all night long.
◘ Saturday - 1pm "Power Pools" reseeded double group round robin stage
◘ Sunday - 1pm WildCard Round, the lower half of the teams from Saturday are all back for a double elimination tournament - winning team gets $100 Gift Card as well as an invitation to. --------- 6pm Championship Round, the top half teams return (along with the Wildcard winners) for a double elimination tournament and this time it's WINNER TAKE ALL for $1000 cash and the celebration continues until 1am.

-
Signups
https://tinyurl.com/SkylineSwarm <--Team Rosters
$30 (available at the host stand) <--- Weekend Pass/Entry Fee (includes entries for the weekend, no additional venue charges)
-
Free Play Killer Queen links:
KQ League -> https://www.facebook.com/groups/fpkql
Discord - https://discord.gg/bcDNHpSnm6
Community Group -> https://www.facebook.com/groups/fpaplayers
-
Contact chris@freeplayinc.com for concerns or additional details.

name: Spring Series - Killer Queen - Reverse Draft
description:
The Captains for this draft tournament will all be drone/objective mains.  They may flex later in the maps but must start as objective focused drones


Format, FT3,  All 4 maps played in order, (Day Night Dusk Twilight), loser of Twilight picks ultimate map if necessary

name: Spring Series - Killer Queen - Knockout Stage
description: All participants in the group stage seeded in a double elimination knockout tournament.  Format, RPS to decide cab side, FT3, First map always Day, loser choses next map, may only choose a map they have not previously won.

name: Spring Series - Killer Queen - Group B
description: Second Group stage of Spring Series Killer Queen.  All 4 maps played, round robin, no elimination, all teams advance to knockout round.
